title: Russia sends warships close to Britain, again
text:
Russia sends warships close to Britain, again 2:35am IST - 01:10 
A British frigate escorted Russian ships through the English Channel on Monday, Britain's defense ministry said, adding that it was the latest sign of an upsurge in Russian naval activity near UK waters during the holidays. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
